rejection.details:
Local planning decisions are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council directly. Find out how to petition your council here: https://www.cheshirewestandchester.gov.uk/your-council/consultations-and-petitions/petitions/petitions.aspx
